name: ChronicObstructivePulmonaryDisease
title: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set identifies patients with a diagnosis of chronic obstructive pulmonary disorder (COPD).),(Data Element Scope: This value set was intended to map to the QDM data type of diagnosis, but has the potential to be used in additional ways.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set includes acute COPD exacerbations, and end stage COPD. It also includes mild through severe COPD classifications.),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set excludes concurrent infections. It also excludes diagnoses of bronchitis, bronchiolitis, and emphysema.)

concept.display: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease with acute lower respiratory infection
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease with (acute) exacerbation
